snippet.title: Lizards Must Die 2: Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Brothers and Sisters!


This day has come, the day when the Rus will fight against their sworn enemies for the last time.
Lizards Must Die 2 is coming out!!!

The damn lizards didn't even think about giving up! Enlisting the support and secret technologies of their secret patrons, the Reptilians, they invaded the lands of the Rus and captured most of them. Hyperborea is under siege, Baikal is built up with waste factories, Rus villages are on fire, and dinosaurs are in captivity, and only Rus heroes can save their land.

Choose one of the characters: Drocheslav Sergey's son, Vseslav the Sorserer, Viktor Korneplod or Mstislav Dubolyub and RUN to SMASH LIZARD FACES solo or with friends.

A POWERFUL 3-4-hour adventure through UNIQUE locations, FUNNY dialogues and a HARDCORE SOUNDTRACK awaits you.

EXTRA HOT AS WE LIKE IT.


Buy ON STEAM:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/3107800/RUSY_PROTIV_YASHHEROV_2/

FELLOW BROTHERS! We are now taking meme games to a new level.
